messages.messageBody:
You probably know this: http://postsecret.blogspot.com/
But this week there is one up about getting only A's at school and
still not being happy. It's not the ultimate "proof" but it's a good
reminder for me that school cannot guarantee anything either.

Greetings
Johanna
